ad_text: Nurses Care Inc Sponsored RNs, PTs, and OTs come join one of the greatest teams of healthcare workers in the Cinci/Dayton region! We have been in business for 32 years, treat our staff like family, and we have fun doing it! If you're tired of 12 hour shifts, working nights/weekends, and would like to make your own schedule, we have the job for you! Available immediately are full-time, part-time, and PRN positions. We offer competitive pay, medical, dental, vision, life ins, 401(K), fuel reimbursement, as well as a great PTO plan! We are currently offering a $4,000 sign-on bonus, as well as other opportunities for extra bonuses! We have openings in areas from north of Dayton all the way down to Milford/Cincinnati. Come join a team of heroes that loves to serve our patients and represent our profession in the greatest way possible! Call (513) 424-1141; stop in our Miamisburg location at 9009 Springboro Pike; or fill out an online application at https://www.nursescareinc.com/ today to start your career at the company you will want to call "home"! Nurses Care Inc Nurses Care is a locally owned and operated home health care agency that has been serving patients in the greater Cinci-Dayton area since 1991. Call Now
